dev.services

Class PetService

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.services.PetService

  • public class PetService
extends java.lang.Object
    Project 1:

    The PetService class serves as a representation of an access point for the system's Pet data stored on the appropriate postgresql database table where a shelter worker can search through, retrieve content, add new, update or remove content from the collection. This will serve as a means of interaction with a collection of Pet subclass instances that Employees can perform the requested actions mentioned above when tasked to do so.

    Created:
    29 April 2020, Barthelemy Martinon
    With assistance from: August Duet
    Modifications:
    29 April 2020, Barthelemy Martinon, Created class. Prototyped cosntructor, instance variables, getters, setters, searchByID, addNewPet, removePet and updatePet around initial (current) projected idea of structure based around current Pet design. Very much subject to change in near future.

      • searchByID

        public Pet searchByID(int idInput)
        Goes through the Repository's content to search for a pet with the provided ID value. Returns the target Pet if found, and null otherwise.
        Parameters:
        idInput - Specified ID Number being searched for
        Returns:
        result Target pet (or null if none is found)

      • getAllPetsAsList

        public PetList getAllPetsAsList()
        Goes through the Repository's content and returns all Pets in a PetList object.
        Returns:
        result PetList with all pets

      • addNewPet

        public Pet addNewPet(Pet newPet)
        Adds a new Pet (given as input) into the pet list. Does nothing if an item with an ID that already exists is being passed.
        Parameters:
        newItem - New pet to add to the Repository pet list.
        Returns:
        result Pet that was just added

      • removePet

        public Pet removePet(int idInput)
        Removes a Pet that matches the ID input. Returns the removed pet's information when completed. Returns null if no pet with that ID exists.
        Parameters:
        idInput - Specified ID Number of Pet that must be removed
        Returns:
        result Pet that was just removed

      • updatePet

        public Pet updatePet(Pet newPet,
                     int idInput)
        Updates a Pet that matches the ID input with the values given as a Pet input. Does nothing if no pet with that ID exists.
        Parameters:
        idInput - Specified ID Number of Pet that must be removed
